Card-1.title: Net Ninja - git
Card-1.imgAlt: Github cat logo and fork/branch icon.
Card-1.text: A very thorough tutorial and walkthrough explaining the basic usage of git. Recommended.

Card-2.title: Freecodecamp: git
Card-2.imgAlt: Article with a picture of a forrest in the background.
Card-2.text: Another thorough explanation and example of git in use.

Card-3.title: Pro git
Card-3.imgAlt: Bookcover of pro git, with author names; Second edition
Card-3.text: A free eBook on the offcial git website. Good resource.

Card-4.title: Learn git Branching
Card-4.imgAlt: Landing page of git branching, showing game instructions.
Card-4.text: An excellent way to learn about git & branching by playing a game. Recommended.

Card-5.title: Github cheetsheet
Card-5.imgAlt: Github cheatsheet; has a table with two github cats and a laptop.
Card-5.text: A 2 page cheatsheet with the frequently most used git commands.

Card-6.title: The Odin Project: git
Card-6.imgAlt: Beginning of the lesson for the git basics; has odin logo top left, and sidebar for current progress.
Card-6.text: A lesson with many backed resources, examples and exercises. Highly recommended.
